name: nascent-transcription-dynamics
title: Transcription Dynamics (Nascent RNA)
description: Measure active transcription in real-time using nascent RNA capture methods (PRO-seq, GRO-seq, NET-seq). Reveals transcriptional regulation, pause-release, and RNA polymerase dynamics.
content:
Nascent RNA & Transcription Dynamics

Nascent RNA methods (PRO-seq, GRO-seq, NET-seq) capture actively transcribing RNA polymerase, revealing transcription in real-time rather than steady-state RNA.

Why Nascent RNA?

Standard RNA-seq: Measures steady-state RNA (transcription + degradation)

Nascent RNA-seq: Measures only active transcription

  • Real-time Transcription: See polymerase position and activity
  • Transcriptional Regulation: Promoter-proximal pausing, pause-release
  • Enhancer Activity: Detect eRNA production
  • Fast Response: Immediate transcriptional changes

Nascent RNA Methods

  • PRO-seq: Precision run-on, single-nucleotide resolution
  • GRO-seq: Global run-on, broader coverage
  • NET-seq: Native elongating transcript, no run-on
  • 5'-GRO-seq: TSS identification

Scientific Applications

  • Transcription Regulation: Pause-release mechanisms
  • Enhancer Discovery: Identify active enhancers via eRNAs
  • TSS Mapping: Precise transcription start site identification
  • Kinetics: Transcription rates and dynamics
  • Drug Response: Immediate transcriptional effects
  • Transcription Factor Activity: Direct TF binding effects

Pipeline Features

  • Alignment: bwa, bwamem2, or DRAGMAP
  • Strand-specific Processing: Maintain directionality
  • Coverage Graphs: Genome-wide transcription profiles
  • Transcript Identification: Call transcribed regions
  • Pause Index Calculation: Promoter-proximal pausing
  • Quality Metrics: Library complexity, strand specificity

Input Requirements

CSV samplesheet with nascent RNA-seq data (PRO-seq, GRO-seq, NET-seq).

Key Outputs

  • Transcription Profiles: Coverage bigWig files
  • Active Transcripts: BED annotations
  • Quantification: Gene-level nascent RNA counts
  • Pause Indices: Pausing vs elongation ratios
  • TSS Annotations: Transcription start sites

Perfect for: Transcription regulation • Enhancer discovery • Pause-release • Real-time gene expression • Drug MOA
